message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $9,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $8,200 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value, and I want to find a price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can we meet in the middle at $8,750?
